pkmkdoc.description: This provides the mc9s12x, m68hc11, m68hc12 , xgate compiler toolchain to compile and build LibreEMS firmware.

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038\cocoasubrtf360 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 This is the toolchain required to compile LibreEMS firmware sourcecode. It can compile code for the following targets:\ m68hc11\ m68hc12\ mc912x\ xgate\ \ It is installed into /opt/mc9s12x\ }

requirement.message: LibreEMS Toolchain requires at least 110MB of disk space to install.
